title: Green Bird
credit_line: Gift of Mr. and Mrs. James H. Heroy, Jr. in memory of Eva Winkler Weill
provenance_text:
Carl-Henning Pedersen [1913-2007], Copenhagen, Denmark. Mr. and Mrs. James H. Heroy, Jr., Sewickley, PA, by June 1968 to May 10, 1979; their gift to Museum of Art, Carnegie Institute, Pittsburgh, PA, May 1979.

Notes:
[1]. Mr. and Mrs. James H. Heroy, Jr. lent the watercolor to "Exhibition of Paintings, Watercolors, and Drawings by Carl-Henning Pedersen" held at Carnegie Institute, Pittsburgh PA, October - December 1968 (no. 100.) See also copy of correspondence dated June 17, 1968 in curatorial file.
